description: There was previously an issue with opening articles, but the fix was implemented quickly. I would suggest maybe a summary of commands in the description or at least a thing that says "press h to see the help menu" or something. Other than that, it's really cool.
summary: Cool way to easily browse hacker news

description: i think its an interesting project, it seems a little pointless at first but its actually pretty convenient
makes me feel like a l337 h4x0r
